snippet: Sperm whales with indigestion produce excretions known as ambergris, a rare and highly prized commodity. Trade in ambergris is illegal in the United States and Australia.
abstract: Sperm whales with indigestion produce excretions known as ambergris, a rare and highly prized commodity. Trade in ambergris is illegal in the United States and Australia.

headline.main: There's Alternatives to the Gold in Them Thar Whales
